tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following quantities increases with the addition of a catalyst?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Gibbs free energy
X) Activation energy
Y) Reaction rate
Z) Equilibrium constant
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following occurs when a dilute solution of ammonia is added to a solution containing iron(III) ions?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Fe(NH_(2))_(3) precipitates
X) Fe(OH)_(3) precipitates
Y) The solution turns from yellow to blue
Z) Hydrogen gas is given off
